code: import React,{useState}from"react";import styles from"./HomePage.module.css";import{loggedInServer}from"./Util.js";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function HomePage(_ref){let{onLogout}=_ref;const[activeTab,setActiveTab]=useState("Servers");const renderContent=()=>{switch(activeTab){case"Servers":return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:styles.tab_panel,children:"Server management tools and list go here."});case"Zones":return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:styles.tab_panel,children:"Zone management section."});case"Server Statistics":return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:styles.tab_panel,children:"Performance graphs and metrics appear here."});default:return null;}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:styles.homepage_container,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("header",{className:styles.homepage_header,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:styles.homepage_left,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{role:"img",className:styles.home_icon,children:"\uD83C\uDFE0"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"/",className:styles.home_link,children:"Home"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:styles.homepage_url_label,children:"API URL"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:styles.homepage_server,children:loggedInServer()})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:styles.logout_button,onClick:onLogout,children:"Logout"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("nav",{className:styles.homepage_tabs,children:["Servers","Zones","Server Statistics"].map(tab=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:tab===activeTab?styles.tab_button_active:styles.tab_button,onClick:()=>setActiveTab(tab),children:tab},tab))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("main",{className:styles.homepage_content,children:renderContent()})]});}export default HomePage;
